# Structuring an R project

You may have a random `.R` file somewhere on your hard drive with scribblings of codes in it. But when it comes to developing anything remotely serious, we ask you to put it in a well-structured R project that's tracked by a version control system.

::: {.callout-note}
For MGH students, it is mandatory to have all your technical work structured inside an R project which is tracked by a private GitHub repository under your chosen username. 
:::
